patch:
@@ -328,14 +328,6 @@ dependencies {
 
     implementation "org.springframework.security:spring-security-ldap"
     implementation "org.freemarker:freemarker:${freemarker_version}"
-    // FIXME: do we need these social related libraries?
-    implementation "org.springframework.social:spring-social-security:${spring_social_version}"
-    implementation "org.springframework.social:spring-social-core:${spring_social_version}"
-    implementation "org.springframework.social:spring-social-config:${spring_social_version}"
-    implementation "org.springframework.social:spring-social-google:${spring_social_google_version}"
-    implementation "org.springframework.social:spring-social-facebook:${spring_social_facebook_version}"
-    implementation "org.springframework.social:spring-social-twitter:${spring_social_twitter_version}"
-    implementation "org.springframework.social:spring-social-linkedin:${spring_social_linkedin_version}"
     implementation "org.jboss.aerogear:aerogear-otp-java:${aerogear_version}"
 
     // test dependencies

@@ -36,11 +36,6 @@ spotbugs_plugin_version=4.2.0
 ## XM custom properties
 lombok_version=1.18.10
 xm_commons_version=2.1.23-SNAPSHOT
-spring_social_version=2.0.0.M2
-spring_social_google_version=1.0.0.RELEASE
-spring_social_facebook_version=3.0.0.M1
-spring_social_twitter_version=2.0.0.M1
-spring_social_linkedin_version=2.0.0.M1
 embedded_ldap_version=0.7
 freemarker_version=2.3.26-incubating
 aerogear_version=1.0.0

@@ -90,7 +90,6 @@ public void configure(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception {
                 .sessionCreationPolicy(SessionCreationPolicy.STATELESS)
                 .and()
                 .authorizeRequests()
-                .antMatchers("/social/**").permitAll()
                 .antMatchers("/api/register").permitAll()
                 .antMatchers("/api/activate").permitAll()
                 .antMatchers("/api/authenticate").permitAll()

@@ -1,5 +0,0 @@
-/**
- *
- */
-// FIXME: to remove old social network integration
-package com.icthh.xm.uaa.social;

@@ -1,21 +0,0 @@ - - - - uaa account activation - - - - -

- Dear ${user.firstName + ' ' + user.lastName} -

-

- Your uaa account has been created with a ${provider} connection. -

-

- Regards, -
- XM^online Team. -

- -

@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<databaseChangeLog
+    xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
+    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+    xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-3.4.xsd">
+
+    <changeSet id="20210305122900" author="oyershov">
+
+        <dropTable tableName="social_connection" />
+
+    </changeSet>
+
+</databaseChangeLog>

@@ -32,6 +32,7 @@
 
     <include file="classpath:config/liquibase/changelog/20200512132800_update_client_scopes_column.xml" relativeToChangelogFile="false"/>
     <include file="classpath:config/liquibase/changelog/20210127160400_block_client.xml" relativeToChangelogFile="false"/>
+    <include file="classpath:config/liquibase/changelog/20210305122900_drop_social_connection_table.xml" relativeToChangelogFile="false"/>
 
     <!-- jhipster-needle-liquibase-add-changelog - JHipster will add liquibase changelogs here -->
     <!-- jhipster-needle-liquibase-add-constraints-changelog - JHipster will add liquibase constraints changelogs here -->

 email.changed.title=XM^online password changed
